abstract: As the debate over the financial regulatory bill nears an end in Congress, many on Wall Street are shifting their attention to see what new regulations will come out of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision.
snippet: As the debate over the financial regulatory bill nears an end in Congress, many on Wall Street are shifting their attention to see what new regulations will come out of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision.
lead_paragraph: As the debate over the financial regulatory bill nears an end in Congress, many on Wall Street are shifting their attention to Switzerland to see what new regulations will come out of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision, the international banking watchdog.

headline.main: Next Worry for Wall Street: Basel Bank Rules
